short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension reveals hotel's points rate in the Hyatt.com search results

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enables you to see point rate while searching for a Hyatt property on the Hyatt.com desktop website. Each property will show smallest number of points needed for a redemption. If the hotel doesn't have points availability for a given period of time, it will say "N/A"
